item.title: Azure functions auth in k8s
item.description: Azure functions make it very easy to run your pieces of code in Azure. The cool thing is that they also make it very easy to use your functions inside a k8s cluster. But not all stuff is supported. The functionapp resource is giving you a ‘wrapper’ that: Allows you to swap between different slots Use secrets from a keyvault in your application settings Host your function with custom domains Use keys to protect your HTTP functions with an api key App keys protect all HTTP functions Function keys protect specific HTTP functions Functions use an attribute (HttpTrigger(AuthorizationLevel.
